channel.title: Comments on: Caller ID on Dish Network DVR

item.title: By: Lisa Starrett
item.dc:creator: Lisa Starrett
item.description: There is no menu button on our dish remote.. So how do we get the caller I'd to.come back on? We had it and now nothing shows up. We have not changed any settings and our phone jack is plugged into it.
item.content:encoded:
There is no menu button on our dish remote..
So how do we get the caller I’d to.come back on? We had it and now nothing shows up. We have not changed any settings and our phone jack is plugged into it.

item.title: By: John masla
item.dc:creator: John masla
item.description: We tried following your install directions several times and my subscribed Caller ID still does not appear on the TV screen . HELP!
item.content:encoded: We tried following your install directions several times and my subscribed Caller ID still does not appear on the TV screen . HELP!

item.title: By: Jeffery Pappas
item.dc:creator: Jeffery Pappas
item.description: Caller ID not working on my dish receiver has previously worked all lines hooked up properly still not working.
item.content:encoded: Caller ID not working on my dish receiver has previously worked all lines hooked up properly still not working.

item.title: By: Paul megeath
item.dc:creator: Paul megeath
item.description: How do you connect wirelessly when phone jack is across the room from the box
item.content:encoded: How do you connect wirelessly when phone jack is across the room from the box

item.title: By: Jason
item.dc:creator: Jason
item.description: Why doesn't it work while watching something on the dvr?
item.content:encoded: Why doesn’t it work while watching something on the dvr?

item.title: By: Mary
item.dc:creator: Mary
item.description: How do I check caller I'd history?
item.content:encoded: How do I check caller I’d history?

item.title: By: Mike Uchytil
item.dc:creator: Mike Uchytil
item.description: I want to keep all callers ID on Dish Network for longer than one day. Could do this a few years ago and miss this feature. Is there a setting that I have missed? Everything is setup correctly.
item.content:encoded: I want to keep all callers ID on Dish Network for longer than one day. Could do this a few years ago and miss this feature. Is there a setting that I have missed? Everything is setup correctly.

item.title: By: so0o0confused
item.dc:creator: so0o0confused
item.description: make sure the phone line is plugged into the PHONE port and not the ethernet port on the back of your dish box and goes to the phone wall jack - you can use a splitter
item.content:encoded: make sure the phone line is plugged into the PHONE port and not the ethernet port on the back of your dish box and goes to the phone wall jack – you can use a splitter

item.title: By: Ralph
item.dc:creator: Ralph
item.description: Remember that an active phone line must be connected to the Dish receiver for this feature to work.
item.content:encoded: Remember that an active phone line must be connected to the Dish receiver for this feature to work.

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: I've gone thru all the steps (including checking the connections) and still Caller ID will not work. This happened about a month ago and I was able to get it to work, then it went caput again.
item.content:encoded: I’ve gone thru all the steps (including checking the connections) and still Caller ID will not work. This happened about a month ago and I was able to get it to work, then it went caput again.
